data.text:
As-salÄmu âalaykum,

Welcome to the Dhikr & Dua app by Life With Allah, a daâwah initiative of Ummah Welfare Trust.

A beautiful app with a stunning modern design to help you read dhikr and duas on a daily basis and on key occasions.

The app is totally FREE with NO annoying ads.

Wide Selection

The app features a collection of 500+ duâÄs and dhikr, each of them carefully assigned to a relevant category.

Easy Navigation

The app provides easy navigation through the various collections of duas & dhikr. Just swipe left and right to go to the next or previous dhikr & duâa. Or go immediately to your preferred dhikr or duâa by using the index page.

Translation, Transliteration, Hadith/Virtue

Each dhikr and dua features the above so you can help you read and understand what you are reading. The explanation of each dua and dhikr is coming soon inshallah.

Audio

Running out of time? Find it difficult to read the Arabic? Weâve got you covered. Listen to each duâa and dhikr individually or simply play the whole collection!

Articles

Over 100 articles on dhikr, dua, the Qurâan, ruqyah and more, for you to read from.

Emotions

Feeling anxious or angry? Confused or worried? You can now select whatever emotion youâre feeling and recite the duâa related to it.

Daily Reminder

The daily reminders which are shared on our social media platforms will also be made available for users on the app. Simply go to the âDaily Reminderâ tab to view and share.

Share

Share your favourite dua or dhikr as text and also as an image.

Counter

Each dua or dhikr which needs to be recited multiple times will have a dedicated counter.

A separate stand-alone counter. Simple and easy to use. Just select the preset amounts or choose your custom amount and tap away!

Customisation

Find the Arabic hard to read? Is reading on a screen too difficult? You can change the font of the Arabic text to whatever suits you best. Audio too fast or too slow? Customise the speed of the audio to whatever you're most comfortable with.

Publications

Download a range of FREE publications which are also available on lifewithallah.com

MORE EXCITING FEATURES COMING SOON INSHALLAH.

Please rate the app and share it with your loved ones if you find it beneficial.

If you find any errors or bugs, please let us know by emailing feedback@lifewithallah.com with the details.
